description: Spacing scale based on ComPOSt Design System, optimized for mobile app use

1.description: Primary space reserved for smaller components like Input, Select field, Button, etc. Using it as a general spacing (padding or margin) is not recommended.

2.description: The primary and default space unit
2.usage: Standard space between logically associated elements (multiple buttons, checkbox and label, icon and text)

3.description: Primary space reserved for smaller components like Input, Select field, Button, etc. Using it as a general spacing (padding or margin) is not recommended.

4.description: Standard space between logically associated and unassociated elements
4.usage: Inside of a tooltip; horizontal spacing between associated and unassociated buttons

5.usage: Spacing between related groups of elements

6.description: Standard space between logically primarily unassociated but also secondarily associated elements
6.usage: Form elements like inputs and selects; default app content padding for mobile

8.description: Standard space between empty state and text; default app content padding for larger screens
8.usage: Empty states; content padding on tablets

10.usage: Standard height of bars (app header, bulk action bars)

11.description: Standard space below the empty state in panels or full-page elements
11.usage: Bottom padding for content where there is a 'Go to up' button

12.usage: Spacing for hero sections, large empty states

6px.description: Standard space between logically associated elements

12px.description: Standard space between logically associated and unassociated elements
examples: Horizontal spacing between associated and unassociated buttons

24px.description: Standard space between logically primarily unassociated but also secondarily associated elements
examples: Form elements like inputs and selects
Default app content padding for mobile (portrait)

36px.description: Standard space between empty state and text
examples: Default app content padding for tablets and larger screens

72px.description: Standard space below the empty state in panels or full-page elements
examples: Bottom padding for content where there is a 'Go to up' button

42px.description: Compact size for interactive elements when space is constrained

48px.description: The default size of buttons, inputs, and other interactive elements

54px.description: The bigger size of interaction elements if you need to increase the attention of this element
54px.mobileNote: Enhanced touch target for prominent actions. Aligned with 6px grid.

contentPadding.description: Default app content padding adjusted for mobile screens

touchTargets.description: Minimum touch target size aligned with 6px grid (7x6px)

guidelines.grid: All sizes must align with 6px grid

sectionSpacing.description: Spacing between major sections on mobile
